observation_text: (1) According to reports received from other listeners, this would appear to be Radio-Lyons, but these incidental relays are seldom advertised in programmes.
full_text: Ambrose (Bexhill-on-Sea): (1) According to reports received from other listeners, this would appear to be Radio-Lyons, but these incidental relays are seldom advertised in programmes, (2) yes, would tally with Warsaw, relaying dance music from the Restaurant Rydz; but are you sure this was not Sorö? This station was also giving an outside relay of dance music; it lies east north-east of London, whereas Warsaw is due east.
